The Speaker

The Speaker of the Parliament of the Federation of Harlon is the presiding officer of the House of Assembly, the lower house of the Parliament of Harlon. The Speaker makes order papers and leads the sessions. The Speaker is appointed by the Senate before the General Election. The current Speaker is Dirt0066.

The role of Speaker is to ensure progress between the House of Assembly and Senate, as well as the passing of bills. While monotonous at times, this role is a vital piece of the government. Dirt0066, 3rd Speaker of the Parliament of the Federation of Harlon

In the past, Kovacs_ served as Speaker during the first three terms of Parliament and Howbe during the 4th and 5th term. In case of absence, his Majesty Antlucl I Rex himself takes on the role of Deputy Speaker.

The Parliament of Harlon - Harlon's federal Parliament.
